articles.author: Matt Adams
articles.title: Judge rules Delphi composite sketches aren’t admissible - FOX 59 Indianapolis
articles.description: UPDATE: During Friday’s proceedings, Judge Fran Gull ruled that the sketches aren’t admissible in court. The state filed a motion this week seeking to prohibit the use of the two widely circulated sketches from the early years of the investigation. The defens…
articles.content:
UPDATE: During Friday’s proceedings, Judge Fran Gull ruled that the sketches aren’t admissible in court.
